name: OneTwoTree
description:
Have you ever played dance dance revolution? if no, this is your opportunity to try it out! if yes, well this is your opportunity to replay it again! 

Controlling the game with all 4 arrows, dance with the music as it visually starts, try your best to hit the beat on time or you will burn a tree :(

You have Three Trees, each one represnets one hp of yours.

Enough reading, dive in to the game!
